trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Administra una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> relacionados con la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> puede habilitados y deshabilitados.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Sólo habilita <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objetos recibirán mensajes de prueba y paint llamados desde el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> puede verse como un proxy entre la interfaz de usuario elementos relacionados, que constan de todos los <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos y el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Introducción al servicio de comportamiento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classes.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> clase interactúa con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> clases.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> clase.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> constructor crea un nuevo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> y está habilitada de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo de código se muestra cómo inicializar una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> asociada a la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> se agrega a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, la colección establece esta propiedad para que la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> puede devolver la llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> está habilitado; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> propiedad es `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> clase enviará `HitTest` y `Paint` mensajes a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable and disable an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo habilitar y deshabilitar una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de código completo, vea [Cómo: Extender la apariencia y el comportamiento de los controles en modo de diseño](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> collection.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo obtener acceso a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> colección.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> clase.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a que actualice su ventana de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo forzar una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> ventana para volver a pintar.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de código completo, vea [Cómo: Extender la apariencia y el comportamiento de los controles en modo de diseño](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a que actualice su ventana de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo forzar una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> ventana para volver a pintar.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de código completo, vea [Cómo: Extender la apariencia y el comportamiento de los controles en modo de diseño](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Área que se va a invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a que actualice su ventana de adorno dentro del <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> dado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> que se va a invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a que actualice su ventana de adorno dentro del <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> dado.
